member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEventManager.EnableEvent(Ivi.Visa.Interop.EventType,Ivi.Visa.Interop.EventMechanism,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method enables notification of an event identified by the eventType parameter for mechanisms specified in the mechanism parameter.
member.param: The type of event to enable.
The mechanism type for the event to enable.
If the event type property is CUSTOM_EVENT_TYPE, this argument contains the custom event type number, otherwise it is ignored.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEventManager.DisableEvent(Ivi.Visa.Interop.EventType,Ivi.Visa.Interop.EventMechanism,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function disables servicing of an event identified by the eventType parameter for the mechanisms specified in the mechanism parameter.
member.param: The type of event to disable
The mechanism type of the event to disable.
If the event type property is CUSTOM_EVENT_TYPE, this argument contains the custom event type number, otherwise it is ignored.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEventManager.DiscardEvents(Ivi.Visa.Interop.EventType,Ivi.Visa.Interop.EventMechanism,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function discards all pending occurrences of the specified event types for the mechanisms specified in a given session.
member.param: The type of event to discard.
The mechanism type for the event to discard
If the event type property is CUSTOM_EVENT_TYPE, this argument contains the custom event type number, otherwise it is ignored.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEventManager.WaitOnEvent(System.Int32,Ivi.Visa.Interop.EventType,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method waits for an occurrence of the specified event for a given session.
member.param: The minimum time to wait for an event.
The type of event to wait for.
If the event type property is CUSTOM_EVENT_TYPE, this argument contains the custom event type number, otherwise it is ignored.
member.returns: If the method is successful, IEvent interface of the received event.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEventManager.InstallHandler(Ivi.Visa.Interop.EventType,Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEventHandler*,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function allows applications to install handlers on sessions for event callbacks.
member.param: The type of event for the handler to receive.
The IEventHandler interface pointer of the client-implemented callback object.
A client provided value that uniquely identifies the handler.
If the event type property is CUSTOM_EVENT_TYPE, this argument contains the custom event type number, otherwise it is ignored.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEventManager.UninstallHandler(Ivi.Visa.Interop.EventType,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function allows applications to uninstall handlers for events on sessions.
member.param: The type of event for which to uninstall the handler.
A client provided value that uniquely identifies the handler.
If the event type property is CUSTOM_EVENT_TYPE, this argument contains the custom event type number, otherwise it is ignored.

member.name: T:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488
member.summary: The IFormattedIO488 interface provides basic formatted I/O functionality.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.WriteString(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method appends a string to the formatted I/O object's write buffer.
member.param: If this parameter is true, the formatted I/O object will flush the contents of the write buffer and send an end to the instrument.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.WriteNumber(System.Object,Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEEEASCIIType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method appends a number (in ASCII string format) to the write buffer.
member.param: The number to write to the instrument.
The format to write the number in.
If this parameter is true, the formatted I/O object will flush the contents of the write buffer and send an end to the instrument.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.WriteList(System.Object,Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEEEASCIIType,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method appends an array of arguments to the write buffer in an ASCII list format.
member.param: The array of elements to write.
The format to write the number in.
This parameter may only be a single character string.
If this parameter is true, the formatted I/O object will flush the contents of the write buffer and send an end to the instrument.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.WriteIEEEBlock(System.String,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method appends an ASCII string followed by an IEEE 488.2 Definite-length arbitrary data binary block.
member.param: The string to prepend to the IEEE block data.
The array of data to write to the instrument.
If this parameter is true, the formatted I/O object will flush the contents of the write buffer and send an end to the instrument.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.ReadString
member.summary: This method reads from the read buffer until an end condition is reached (termination character, END signal, etc) and returns the data in a string.
member.returns: The string data retrieved from the read buffer.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.ReadNumber(Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEEEASCIIType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method reads from the read buffer, converting its contents into a numeric value, until an unparsable character is received or an end condition occurs.
member.param: The formatted I/O object will verify that the data is in this format.
If this parameter is true, the formatted I/O object will flush the contents of the write buffer after the retrieved data.
member.returns: The number retrieved from the read buffer.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.ReadList(Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEEEASCIIType,System.String)
member.summary: This method reads from the read buffer until an end condition occurs, interpreting the data as an ASCII list of values.
member.param: The formatted I/O object will attempt to convert the data to this format.
This string is interpreted as list of character separators.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.ReadIEEEBlock(Ivi.Visa.Interop.IEEEBinaryType,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method reads an IEEE 488.2 definite-length arbitrary-data binary block.
member.param: The formatted I/O object will attempt to convert the data to this format.
The method will search for the hash if it is not the first character if this parameter is true.
If this parameter is true, the formatted I/O object will flush the contents of the write buffer after the retrieved data.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.FlushWrite(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method flushes the contents of the write buffer.
member.param: If this parameter is true, the formatted I/O object will send an end to the instrument on the last character in the buffer.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.FlushRead
member.summary: This method flushes the contents of the Read buffer until an end condition is reached.

member.name: M:Ivi.Visa.Interop.IFormattedIO488.SetBufferSize(Ivi.Visa.Interop.BufferMask,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method sets the size of the read, write, or both formatted I/O buffers.

member.summary: This property gets/sets the VISA COM resource session.

member.name: T:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode
member.summary: An enumeration of the VISA-specific return values of the methods in VISA COM I/O. Commands that start with S_ are success codes and commands that start with E_ are error codes.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_SUCCESS
member.summary: Success.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_EVENT_EN
member.summary: Success, but the event is already enabled.

member.summary: Success, but the event is already disabled.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_QUEUE_EMPTY
member.summary: Success, but the event queue was empty.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_TERM_CHAR
member.summary: Success, terminated due to the termination character.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_MAX_CNT
member.summary: Success, terminated due to reaching the maximum count.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_DEV_NPRESENT
member.summary: Success, but the device is not present.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_QUEUE_NEMPTY
member.summary: Success, but the event queue is not empty.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_TRIG_MAPPED
member.summary: Success, but the trigger was already mapped.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_NCHAIN
member.summary: Success, do not invoke any other handlers on this event chain.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_NESTED_SHARED
member.summary: Success, this session has nested shared locks.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_NESTED_EXCLUSIVE
member.summary: Success, this session has nested exclusive locks.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_SYNC
member.summary: Success, but the operation was performed synchronously.

member.name: F:Ivi.Visa.Interop.VisaStatusCode.S_VISA_CONFIG_NLOADED
member.summary: Success, but the specified configuration either does not exist or could not be loaded; using VISA-specified defaults.

member.summary: Success, but the specified object reference is uninitialized.

member.summary: Success, but although the specified attribute state is valid, it is not supported by this implementation.

member.summary: Success, but the specified buffer is not supported
